title: Poems on Several Occasions
author: Stephen Duck
condition: Heavily water damaged with leather split in places and pealing from boards.
notes: This book passed from Elizabeth Jane Witchell to Beatrice Bradley in about 1938 because Beatrice's husband worked as the vicar in Elizabeth's village. After Beatrice's husband died, she stamped her name in the book. An earlier card with Mrs George W. Bradley attests to her likely ownership of the book before her husband's death
